name: Project 1: My CV
description: This project is my CV made at FastTrackIT course, guided by Matei Nicolae. It contains several pieces of information related to my curriculum. There is a 'Home' page with several links, a 'Skills' page  made with JavaScript that contains all of the technologies sorted by endorcements, a 'Projects' page with all my certifications, also designed using JavaScript, and there is also a 'Languages' page that has a table made with JavaScript with the known languages and level. The 'Footer' area contains all the contact link buttons (Linkedin, Github, Youtube, Email). A button with a light buld can also made the contract gray when clicked. On the side of the page there is an area with a 'Contact form' and a 'Rubik's Face' also designed with JavaScript.

name: Project 4: Teams Networking
description: This project is the second one made at FastTrackIT course, guided by Matei Nicolae. It contains a table with the projects made by the student, also ideeas for future projects. There is a 'header', a 'Remove Selected' button to remove content, a 'Search' area for filtering projects. At the bottom of the table there is an 'imput area' where more teams and projects can be added. The source code can be found in the footer area. The filds can be eddited or deleted using the buttons on the left of the table.

name: Project 5: Teams Networking (Udemy version)
description: This project is the second one made at FastTrackIT course, guided by Matei Nicolae. It contains a table with the projects made by the student, also ideeas for future projects. name: Project 7: Meals Planner
description: This project is a table for keeping records or for planning new meals. Meals can be added in the 'Input' area. Meals may be sorted when clicking on hte arrows from the header of the table. You can add, edit or delete meals. A search option is also available

name: Project 8: Birthdays Calendar
description: This project is a table for keeping records of the bithdays or family and friends. New records can be added in the 'Input' area

name: Project 9: Florea Sabo Poetry
description: This project is a collection of poeties written by my mum that can be read moving the left-right buttons. There is also a search button where all the poems can be seen.

name: Project 10: Chis Simona Vegetables
description: This project is an online shop for the vegetables holded by my sister. There is a header area with essential information. In the main area, the pictures with the vegetables are displayed. The footer area is made with the contact buttons to reach the seller

name: Project 11: Centro Estetica Ana
description: This project hold a series of treatments and techniques photos devided. The 'Header' is for the details of the center. The 'footer' holds the contact area buttons

name: Project 12: Vizit Coseiu
description: This project is an invitation to visit the area Coseiu, in Romania. The 'header' holds the main areas for the app

name: Project 13: Todo List
description: This project is a simple way to keep records the list to be done. New tasks can be added in the input area.

name: Project 14: Sunday School Cross-out Game
description: This project was the final test for the course made at the FastTrackIt. I have worked along with my colleague, Denisa, and learnt how to use GitHub. There are several lessons which can be used. The purpose of the app was to cross-out all the false statements. There is also an area where new questions/statements can be added. There is a 'Score' button to display the result in a pop out window. The 'shuffle' button was created to shuffle the statements so each time will be displayed differently

name: Project 15: Simple Quiz App
description: This project was made by Matei Nicolae. I wanted to use it's project to learn more CSS, HTML, and JS so I have an area where I can add my own questions and use them in a quiz test. Very useful and highly recommend it to newbies

name: Project 16: Depozit Coseiu
description: This project is an online shop from Romania. It holds couple of different areas in the menu, that will eventually hold all the products in the shop. Will be an option made to buy online in the future. The 'header' hold important information related to the shop. When using the menu, and selecting a different domain, items will be displayed in the main app. There is a search option in the menu as well

name: Project 17: Free Code Camp
description: This project is a guide to learn JavaScript from FreeCodeCamp.

name: Project 18: Free Code Camp - CSS
description: This project is a guide to learn CSS from FreeCodeCamp youtube channel.

name: Project 19: Romana - Spaniola
description: This project is a collection to learn Spanish

name: Project 20: Cafe Menu
description: This project is a menu made with HTML and CSS using freeCodeCamp
